Gulzora is widowed. She was born in 1982. Gulzora is a careful mother of four children. She is the only breadwinner for her four children. She works hard to earn a living and offer good living conditions for her children. All of them are non-adults. 

10 years ago, Gulzora began her own business buying and selling children's clothes. She has her own selling place in a local market. Gulzora sells a variety of children's clothes. Now, she is selling clothes for the winter season. There is a lot of competition in the local market and that’s why Gulzora periodically renews the assortment of her goods. 

She is going to buy children's clothes for the new winter season and with this aim, she is asking for a loan of 2000 Somoni. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy children's clothes for the new winter season

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a business woman from Dulag, Leyte. She is a 57-year-old married woman and mother of five grown children. She has been operating a sari-sari (variety) store for more than 20 years. She sells flour, sugar, powdered milk, cooking oil, soap, seasonings and canned goods. In addition to that, she also sells  dressed chicken. 

Lorna requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional stocks of dressed chicken and assorted goods for the store. With these, Lorna will provide a wide array of goods to choose from and will cater to her customers' needs. Thus, eventually increasing her earnings and that will help defray the family's daily expenses.

Lorna hopes that her business will prosper for sustainable living.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of dressed chicken and assorted goods for the store

loans.name: Yuliana Aide

texts.es:
Yuliana Aide tiene 23 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera, tiene una 2 hijos, vive en casa propia junto a sus hijos vivienda construida de material rustico(adobe y techo de teja). La vida en el lugar es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería; el lugar donde vive es un pueblo joven de aproximadamente 150 familias dicho pueblo tiene aproximadamente 48 años de creación política y está ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que realiza Yuliana Aide es alquiler de mototaxis, ya que cuenta con dos motos propias y alquila a amigos de su confianza los cuales pagan 12 nuevos soles por alquiler diario por cada moto. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 4 años. El destino del crédito es para compra de repuestos y mantenimiento de sus mototaxis. La inversión le ayudará mantener sus unidades moviles en buen estado y funcionamiento y de esta manera continuar alquilando y generando ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el negocio en la zona no hay competencia en este rubro. Piensa seguir patrimoniandose con otras unidades moviles,Y de esta manera obtener mejores ganancias que le permitan a un mediano o corto plazo aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Yuliana Aide is 23 years old, single and has two children.  She lives with her children in a home that she owns made out of rustic materials (adobe and roof tiles.  Her life there is peaceful, her neighbors work primarily in farming and livestock.  Her town is fairly young and there are about 150 families there.  The town was only established by the government about 48 years ago, and it is located in the district and province of Morropón, which is in the region of Piura on Peru's northern coast.  Her community is dedicated to farming, livestock and commerce.

Yuliana Aide works renting out rickshaws.  She owns two herself and she rents them out to friends who pay her 12 nuevos soles a day for each rickshaw.  She has been in this business for four years.  The loan will be used to purchase spare parts and perform repairs on her rickshaws.  This investment will allow her to ensure that her rickshaws are in good working condition so that she can continue renting them out and earning and income to improve her living conditions.

She has good prospects in this market because there is no competition in this field in her region.  She plans to continue supporting herself with more rickshaws so that she can improve her earnings so that she can increase her income.

loans.use: purchase spare parts and perform repairs on his rickshaws.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 24 años de edad, tiene un hogar estable al lado de sus padres, no tiene hijos y posee casa propia dentro del caserío de Chorrillos, distrito de Callayuc, provincia de Cutervo departamento de Cajamarca. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Julio se dedica a la destilación y comercio de aguardiente, con una antigüedad de 8 años en el negocio, dicho negocio se ubica en el caserío de Chorrillos. El préstamo lo utilizará como capital de trabajo para implementar su negocio. Con el crédito otorgado podrá tener una mayor producción en la destilación y así aumentar su ventas y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio is 24 years old and has a stable home beside that of his parents. He does not have children but does own his house in the Chorrillos hamlet of Callayuc district, Cutervo province in the Cajamarca department. The inhabitants of Julio's community work in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

Julio makes a living distilling and selling "aguardiente" (a spirit). He has been running this business out of Chorrillos for eight years. Julio will use this loan as working capital to invest in his business. With this loan, he will be able to increase production and his sales, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: as working capital to invest in his business.

loans.name: Armie

texts.en:
This is Armie, 33, a resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Armie is married to Ariel, who is a collector, and they have three children of whom one is in High School, and the other two are at the Elementary Level. She manages her household while operating the business. She works hard to augment their income to support and meet their daily personal, household needs and to send her three children to school. 

Armie operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a general store is basically a small convenience store which sells fresh, dry, and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Aside from this, she also has a tricycle unit for a transport service which her husband drives as added income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum net income of PHP 1,000 a day. 

To help Armie continue operations of her general store business, she is requesting a PHP 50,000 loan, which she will use to buy grocery items such as fresh meat, sacks of rice, charcoal, soda and other grocery stuff. She is positive that it will boost her income as she expands her business. Her earnings provide their source to meet their daily expenses and to send her children to school. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Armie hopes to maintain and grow her business so she that they will have a better life. She strives to give her children the best education and prays for a quiet and happy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for groceries, beverages and toiletries to sell

loans.name: Maston

texts.en:
Maston is married and has 3 children. Her husband is a migrant in Russia. She manages all family cares alone. She always wanted to provide her children with a good quality of life, so Maston decided to start a new business with sewing in order to generate an income with which she can contribute to her home’s finances. 

Maston studied the course ‘To Get Ahead’ from a women's organization and got enough skills about business. She will be a very successful business woman as she is hardworking and smart. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS to buy a sewing machine for organizing her new business. She will get through using this loan and her business will grow to be a source of income, so that her family can have a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to progress. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto owns and operates an agriculture business, growing coconut and other crops for sale. Roberto has been engaged in his business for many years and he earns well from these activities.  

His farm is still doing well and yet, he needs financial assistance to improve it. Recently, he took a new loan from GDMPC micro to buy fertilizer to have a more abundant harvest. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from his farm to buy a motorcycle for his transportation purposes.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to have a more abundant harvest

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth sends you her thankfulness for your generosity because her previous loan has entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional herbal medicines and food supplements which are needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs.

Elizabeth is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will lend her an amount of 15,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional stocks of herbal supplies and other products of the same kind. Her customers will likely buy more items if she has more of her products to sell. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business to become viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Elizabeth wants her business to become more established and sustainable so she could attract more customers. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional herbal supplies and products needed for her business.

loans.name: Nidia Xiomara

texts.es: Nidia de 45 años de edad se dedica a la venta de panes con pollos en su lugar de residencia desde hace 4 años, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere terminar de construir el cuarto que muestra en la fotografía pero no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de arena, ladrillos, cemento, hierro, laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para poder vivir junto con su familia mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Nidia is 45 years old and has been selling bread with chicken out of her home for four years and is able to pay her household expenses with her income.  She wants to finish building the room shown in the image, but she doesn’t have enough capital.  She is asking for this loan to buy sand, bricks, cement, iron bars, beams, and pay for labor so that she can her family can live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Glenda Yamilet

texts.es: Glenda de 33 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia y se dedica a vender ganchos para el cabello de forma ambulante cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería para obtener mejores ganancias y así tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Glenda is 33 years old and lives with her relatives in her own home.  She sells hair clips on foot near her home and uses her income to help with the household expenses.  She is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise so she can increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hair clips.

loans.name: Danila Odili

texts.es:
Desde su infancia a Danila le gusto jugar a ser enfermera, cuidar a los enfermos, siempre le pedía a su mama que le comprara los juguetes para atender a sus familiares, y es ahora y sigue con esa misma iniciativa que comenzó desde corta edad, ahora Danila cursa el último año de su carrera Enfermería y trabaja como auxiliar en el Centro de Salud de su comunidad, ayudar a las personas, siempre fue su sueño y ahora está a punto de cumplirlo, Danila ha sido una joven, emprendedora, esforzada, trabajadora, quien ha contado con su propio apoyo e interés para culminar sus estudios. Ahora quiere ser una profesional completa. 

Danila ha demostrado ganarse el corazón de sus pacientes y compañeros de trabajo, su sonrisa es contagiosa, Danila solicita el crédito para el pago de unos módulos de la universidad, puesto que del pago de estos depende que pueda obtener su título, de otra manera no podrá obtenerlo. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento del crédito que le garantizara un fututo prospero donde podrá optar por otra plaza de trabajo. Como planes a futuro Danila tiene pensado seguir estudiando y obtener una especialización para seguir ayudando a las personas, como una profesional.
texts.en:
Ever since she was a little girl, Danila liked to play at being a nurse and caring for sick people.  She would always ask her mother to buy her toys that she could use to care for her family members.

Now she is continuing what she started at such an early age; she is studying in her last year of nursing school, and working as an aid in her community health center.

Helping people has always been her dream, and now she is about to achieve it.  Danila is an enterprising, earnest, hardworking young woman who has always counted on her own support and money to complete her studies; and now she wants to be a complete professional. 

Danila has won the hearts of her patients and co-workers, and her smile is contagious.  Danila is requesting a loan to pay for some university courses that are required in order for her to earn her degree.  Otherwise, she won’t be able to get it.

She is putting her faith in the funding of the loan that will guarantee her a prosperous future, in which she can pursue another position. Danila’s plans for the future are to continue studying, and to earn a specialized degree in order to continue helping people as a professional.

loans.use: to pay for some university courses.

loans.name: Ana Leticia

texts.es: Ana tiene 49 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee desde hace 30 años una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, Ana  está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 49 years old and she lives in her own house with her husband.  She has had a store in her place of residence for more than 30 years, and she has many customers because of her good prices and friendly service.  

Ana is requesting a loan in order to purchase more soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, etc.  In this way, she will be able to have better earnings for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her bakery.

loans.name: Los Vecinos Group

texts.es:
Melfy es una mujer de 32 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene cuatro hijos de catorce, diez, ocho y 5 años de edad, y su negocio es la panadería.
Ella es trabajadora, responsable, constante, buena madre, y emprendedora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona sur de su ciudad, un lugar de clima cálido tropical muy húmedo con una temperatura constante de 30 grados aproximadamente durante todo el año y que reúne una vez al año cerca a mil artesanos en la denominada feria de ‘la Alasita’ dónde se oferta todo tipo de bienes en miniatura con el fin de que esa miniatura se materialice y se haga realidad (la creencia dice que se compran sueños para que se hagan realidad, por ejemplo: un auto en miniatura se materializa –al pasar un año- en un automóvil de verdad).
Melfy es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el español y habla guaraní por herencia familiar (sentada al centro, camisa a rayas celeste). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al comercio y sus cuatro hijos, tres estudian en la escuela y el menor se encuentra a su cuidado, viven en una casa propia de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. Gracias a su impulso de superación reunió a personas con necesidades similares y negocios como; venta de cubiertas de celulares, venta de hoja de coca, venta de jugo de quinua, venta de perfumes, venta de refrescos, venta de polleras y venta de helado, para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus negocios. Su negocio es la panadería, y sus variedades son; pan de arroz, pan de maíz, el cuñapé, el sonso, que forman parte de los típicos “horneaos” de la gastronomía oriental. Acompañados con un café o té, ayudan a combatir las bajas temperaturas o a disfrutar de las cálidas tardes cruceñas. Su sueño es tener una panadería amplia y surtida. Ella desea realizar la compra de diferentes harinas (trigo, maíz, arroz, etc.) por mayor, para adelantarse a las fiestas de fin de año, donde las ventas aumentan. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en seis meses que lleva como panadera independiente (antes trabajaba como ayudante en una panadería grande).
Es por esos motivos que Melfy solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina por mayor para complacer a sus clientes con sus exquisitos horneados.
texts.en:
Melfy is a 32-year-old woman. She lives with her partner and has four children of ages 14, 10, 8, and 5. Her business is baking. She is hardworking, responsible, persistent, a good mother, and entrepreneurial. 

She does her work in the southern part of the city – a place with a hot, very humid climate, and a constant temperature of approximately 30º during the entire year.  In this area, once a year, about a thousand artisans meet in the trade fair called “la Alasita.” At the fair, all kinds of miniature goods are sold, with the goal being that the miniature will be brought to life and become reality. (The belief is that at the fair you buy dreams so that they become reality. For example, a miniature car materializes – after a year – in a real car.) 

Melfy has dark skin and long black hair. Her native language is Spanish, and she also speaks Guarani because of her family heritage. (In the picture, she is sitting in the center in a shirt with sky-blue stripes.) She shares her life with her partner, who makes a living in trade, and her four children, three of whom are in school and the youngest who is in her care. They live in their own brick house with potable water and electricity. 

Thanks to her drive for self-improvement, she brought together people with similar needs and business such as: selling cell phone cases, selling coca leaves, selling quinoa juice, selling perfumes, selling soft drinks, selling traditional skirts, and selling ice cream, to request a loan and expand their businesses. Her business is baking, and the varieties of baked goods she makes are: rice bread, corn bread, cheese bread, and “sonso” (a baked good made of yucca and cheese). These are all part of the typical baked goods of the eastern gastronomy. Accompanied by coffee or tea, they help to fight low temperatures or to enjoy the hot Santa Cruz afternoons. 

Her dream is to have a spacious, stocked bakery. She wants to buy various flours (wheat, corn, rice, etc.) at wholesale, to get ready for the end-of-year festivals, when sales increase. This is the first sequence of loans that she requests from the institution in her six months as an independent bakery (before, she worked as an assistant in a large bakery).

It is for these reasons that Melfy is requesting a loan to buy flour at wholesale, to please her customers with her exquisite baked goods.

loans.use: to buy flour at wholesale, to please her customers with her exquisite baked goods.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María de 38 años de edad es una mujer feliz, ya que cuenta con una familia constituida por su esposo, sus 2 niñas de 12 y 6 años de edad y un varón de 14 años de edad con los que habita en vivienda propia desde hace 10 años. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que se gana la vida vendiendo diferentes platillos típicos como: pasteles de carne, enchiladas, yuca frita y sancochada, etc. actividad que realiza desde hace mucho tiempo y que le ha permitido apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar. María desea construir una galera en su vivienda, pero no cuenta con la liquidez económica necesaria, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, lámina y madera para construir una galera en su vivienda.
texts.en: María, 38, has a much-loved family: her husband; her 2 daughters, 12- and 6- years old; and a son, 14-years old.  They live in a house that they have owned for 10 years.  María has a hard-earned food business, making and selling the prepared foods that are most in demand here: enchiladas, meat pies, etc.  She has operated the business for several years and her earnings help to support the family.  María wants to add a porch to the family house but doesn't have the money at hand to fund it.  She is applying to FUSAI for a loan that she will use to buy the materials she needs--cement, sand, gravel, etc.--to carry out the project.

loans.use: to add a porch to her house.

loans.name: Miguel Neftali

texts.es: Miguel de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el trabaja como albañil y tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por su buen trabajo, Miguel quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un baño y una pila en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillo, hierro, arena, laminas, polines, etc. y así el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en: Miguel, 41, and his family live in a house that they own.  He is a construction worker, much in demand because he is an excellent worker.  Miguel wants to improve his house by adding a bathroom on the spot where he's standing in the photo.  He is applying for a loan because he doesn't have the money he needs at hand to buy the materials he needs.  He will use the loan to buy cement, bricks, iron bar, sand and other building materials to carry out the project.  The investment will make the house more comfortable for his family.

loans.use: to add a bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay college expenses.

loans.name: Mastanoy

texts.en:
Mastanoy was born in 1956. She has experienced a lot of difficulties in her life. Her husband died many years ago and she raised her children alone. She has 6 children whose age ranges from 21 to 34. 

She worked for many years as a teacher in a local school. Now, she is a pensioner and she also has been busy with animal husbandry. Mastanoy is a very hard working woman and she works every day to earn a living. 

Now, she needs financial support as she must hold her daughter's wedding party. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 TJS with this aim. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter's wedding party.

loans.name: Xavier Ernesto

texts.es: Xavier de 33 años de edad posee un taller de calzado, repara y elabora calzado, su taller lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad del producto, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Xavier vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cuero, hilo, pega, tela, etc. para seguir con su elaboración ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo  y así tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Xavier is 33 years old and has a shoe workshop in his home where he makes and repairs shoes.  He has many customers and is able to cover his household expenses with his income.  Xavier lives with his life’s partner in a home of his own.  He is asking for this loan to buy leather, thread, glue, fabric, etc. so he can continue making shoes since this is his only source of income.  This will allow him and his family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Sherli Baba Group

texts.en:
This group is located in J.K.Pur village of Rayagada district in Odisha, India. The group consists of four women members from the below poverty line category, and Gousia is one of them. The lady standing second from right with a raised hand in the photo is Gousia. She is 25 years old. She is the leader of this group. She lives with her two daughters. 

Gousia is running a grocery shop as well as doing tailoring jobs. Gousia manages the in-house activities as well as the grocery business. From these businesses, she earns a monthly income of 5,500 Indian rupees. According to Gousia, in the context of the present market situation, this income is hand-to-mouth for her family, so it is very difficult to think for the future. Although there is potential market for her business, finances are a hindrance to her. 

After the intervention of Mahashakti Foundation in her village, Gousia saw a ray of hope and motivated other women members to lend from Mahashakti Foundation by forming this group. It will be their first loan cycle. With the present loan, she has planned to purchase more grocery items, such as rice, wheat, oil, tea, sugar, potatoes, onions, washing powder, soaps, etc., to expand the existing business. She hopes this will help her to generate more income to materialize her dream of giving better education to her children and constructing a house for her family. 

The other three members of the group are also running small enterprises: a scrap materials business, bamboo works and electrical shop.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items, such as rice, wheat, oil, tea, sugar, potatoes, onions, washing powder, soaps, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es estudiante de la carrera de Enfermería, comenta que aun no tiene un trabajo fijo, pero que a veces cuida a personas que están enfermas, y de esa forma se gana un poco de ingresos para ayudar en sus estudios.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando y luchando por mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Nancy is a Nursing student. She says that she does not have a permanent job yet, but that sometimes she takes care of sick people, and in this way she earns a little bit of income to help in her studies.

She is requesting this loan to be able to cover fees, and in this way be able to continue studying and fighting to improve her life conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, sheeting, chain link, and wood, in order to build a covered, fenced-in area at her home.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es: Guadalupe tiene 42  años de edad es madre soltera y vive en casa propia con su hija, ella tiene un puesto de venta de comida cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 8 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas materia prima arroz, pollos, carne, frijoles, fruta, verduras, etc. para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Guadalupe, age 42, is a single mother. She and her daughter live in their own home, and she runs a stand selling food near her home. For the last eight years, the earnings from this business have been enough to meet her household expenses. She is requesting this loan to purchase more raw ingredients, including rice, chicken, beef, beans, fruits, vegetables, and more. This will help her to vary her menu and have a bit more going for her economically. Her greater earnings will mean greater economic stability.

loans.use: buy ingredients to stock her food stall

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca de 34 años de edad es una mujer que se esfuerza para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos dos niñas de 14 y 12 años de edad y un varón de 10 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida cortando café en una finca cercana, por lo que debe poner todo su empeño para realizar la mayor corta posible y así obtener mejores ingresos. Blanca siempre busca lo mejor para su familia y como madre soltera su responsabilidad es mayor, ella ha observado que en su vivienda la necesidad de contar con energía eléctrica es básica, por ello desea adquirir un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: un poste, alambre eléctrico, tomacorriente, caja térmica e interruptores para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Blanca, age 34, works herself hard to get her three children ahead. She has two daughters ages 14 and 12 and a 10-year-old boy. She is a hard-working woman who makes a living by cutting coffee in a nearby farm; it takes all of her drive to do the best possible cuttings so that she can earn the greatest income possible. Blanca is always seeking the best for her family and as a single mother, her responsibility is even greater. She has observed being able to rely on electricity in her home is a basic need, which is why she is seeking this loan from FUSAI. She will invest it in purchasing a post, electrical wire, power outlets, a thermal box, and switches so that she can install electrical energy in her home.

loans.use: buy supplies to provide her home with electricity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy spare electrical parts for automobiles

loans.name: Gustavo Josue

texts.es:
Gustavo Josue tiene 43 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive Gustavo Josue la población se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Gustavo Josue se dedica a la venta de raspadillas cuyos sabores son de fresa, vainilla, chocolate, coco y lúcuma; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, él necesita realizar la compra de insumos para su raspadillas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad en lo que respecta a sus raspadillas, con gran influencia en el negocio; Gustavo Josue piensa incrementar su stock de insumos para poder atender toda la demanda de los diversos gustos y preferencias de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Gustavo Josue is 43 years old, married and responsible for two children. He lives with his family in a rural area in Oyotún district, which belongs to Chiclayo province and the Lambayeque region in the north of Peru. The population of the community where Gustavo Josue lives mainly works in agriculture, raising livestock or in commerce.

Gustavo Josue sells snow cones for a living. He offers the flavors strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, coconut and lucuma. He has over 10 years of experience in his line of business and sells from his home. He is asking for the loan to gain working capital as he needs to buy ingredients for his snow cones. The said capital will enable him to offer more flavors which will greatly influence his business. Gustavo Josue intends to increase his ingredient stock so as to be able to meet the different tastes and preferences of his customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for his snow cones

loans.name: Maulid

texts.en:
Maulid is 42 years old, married, and has two sons who attend school. 

He has managed a shop selling phone accessories for 10 years and provides money transfers through the phone, Tigo pesa. He works from 7am to 9pm daily to make a good monthly profit. 

Maulid has taken and successfully repaid several loans from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used those credits to buy business accessories including batteries, chargers, phone covers, airtime,  and recharged his Tigo pesa fault. Maulid also purchased a DVD deck, digital items for his home TV program, covered school fees, and paid for household expenses. In the coming days, Maulid would like to enlarge his shop. 

He will be responsible for repaying the loan. Maulid will invest his credit request to recharge his Tigo pesa fault to service more people.

loans.use: to recharge his Tigo pesa fault to service more people.

loans.name: Katherin

texts.es:
Katherin es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, a la vez que trabaja, también estudia, está siguiendo la carrera de psicología, y por medio de esto quiere ir superándose. Está siguiendo también un curso de certificado de creación de negocios, y es con ello que irá creciendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas del curso, de manera a ir formándose como profesional.
texts.en:
Katherin is a very hardworking and determined person. She both works and studies at the same time. She is pursuing a degree in psychology, and through this she wants to improve herself. She is also pursuing a certificate in the creation of businesses, and with that she will keep growing. 

She is seeking this loan to be able to pay fees for her degree, so that she can go on educating herself as a professional.

loans.use: to pay fees for her degree.

loans.name: Gloria Esperanza

texts.es: Gloria de 29 años de edad es una persona reconocida en su cantón por su laboriosidad ya que desde hace 4 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales y pasteles de carne los que distribuye en su cantón y los cantones cercanos. Ella vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 3 y 8 años de edad en vivienda propia desde hace 5 años. Gloria desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda, y es por ello que desea adquirir un crédito con FUSAI para invertir en: cable eléctrico, tubos, tomacorriente, interruptores y una caja térmica para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda y así poder contar con este servicio.
texts.en:
Gloria, age 29, is known throughout her neighborhood for her hard-working spirit. For the last four years, she has been in the business of making and selling tamales and meat pies which she sells in her own neighborhood and in nearby ones. She and her partner have lived in their own home with their two children, ages 3 and 8 years, for five years now.
Gloria wants to install electricity in her home, which is why she is seeking this loan from FUSAI. She will use it to invest in electrical wire, tubes, outlets, switches, and an electrical box so that she can have reliable electrical power in her home.

loans.use: install electricity in her home

loans.name: Nickson

texts.en:
Nickson is a 45-year-old married man with two school-aged children.  He operates a retail shop to sell a variety of polythene bags.  He has sold eggs   for  three years and earns a monthly income of 15,000 KES.
	 		
He has applied for his third loan of 113,860 KES from VisionFund Kenya and intends to use the loan amount to buy a new motor bike which he will use to deliver eggs to his customers. 

Nickson  will use the anticipated profits to provide for the family's basic needs. He hopes to grow his business and open a bigger workplace.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike.

loans.name: Kunthy

texts.en:
Kunthy, 46 years old, is a married woman who lives in Prey Veng Province of Cambodia. She is a mother of three children. She has taught for 20 years  and earns $6 USD  per day. 

Kunthy wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine. This will help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Saul Antonio

texts.es: Saul de 46 años de edad  vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 25 años, experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de vender una buena calidad de producto por esa razón posee clientes fijos, el esta solicitando un crédito ya que necesita darle mantenimiento a la lancha que muestra en la fotografía ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos y asi el su hijo tendrán una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Saul is forty-six years old and lives in a house that he owns together with his son. He has made a living fishing for twenty-five years. This experience has allowed him to be able to sell a high-quality product, and he consequently has many stable clients.

He is requesting a loan so that he can provide some much needed maintenance to his fishing boat (seen in the photo). This is his only means of income and of offering his son a better quality of life.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his fishing boat.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima lives in Dili and requests  $600.00 to improve her business. She began selling vegetables in 2013 using her own working capital of $ 150.00 . 

She will use the loan to buy more carrots, garlic, and other vegetables to meet her customer's preferences. She is pleased that the loan from Tuba Rai Metin will provide working capital to buy more vegetables.

loans.use: to buy carrots, garlic, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a tank and a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.en:
Manzura, born in 1971, has 2 children and tries to provide for their success. Manzura has a pedagogical education and has worked in a kindergarten for 7 years.  She likes her job and works with pleasure. 

Manzura’s husband is a worker, and because of their small income, they live poorly. Manzura asks for 700 TJS to buy as refrigerator for her household.

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy refrigerator for her household.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 25 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo se dedica a la crianza de pollos, los comercializa en los diferentes mercados, y con lo que obtiene de las ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan, el joven vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su compañera de vida, el está solicitando un credito para la compra de concentrado y mas pollos para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en:
This young man is twenty-five years old and lives in a very high-risk area. Because of this, his face has been pixelated. 

He makes a living raising chickens and selling them at different local markets. With the income he earns from this work, he is able to cover some of his home expenses. He lives in a house that he owns with his three children and life partner. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase chicken feed and more chickens so that he may continue with his work.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed and more chickens.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar,  se dedica a la venta de lácteos, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo y la puerta que muestra en la fotografía por otra más cerrada, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de laminas, hierros, polines, puerta y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Ana, age 40, lives in her own home with her family. Her primary work is selling dairy products. She wants to repair her home by changing the roof and the door that is shown in the photo for one that is more closed off.  What she earns from her sales isn't enough to cover the work that she wants to do, which is why she is requesting this loan. She will use it to buy sheets of metal, iron bars, roof girders, and the door and to pay for manual labor. All of this is so that she and her family can live more safely and comfortably.

loans.use: buy supplies and labor to replace a roof and door of her home

loans.name: Sherybel

texts.en: Sherybel, aged 33, is married to a driver and blessed with three children. She has been selling vegetables for a living using her motorcycle for almost three years. She earns a net income of PHP 200 daily. Her net income on this business is usually spent on their daily expenses. Due to insufficient funds, she would like to obtain a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase eggplant, squash, and string beans to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase eggplant, squash, and string beans to sell.

loans.name: Felismina

texts.en: Felismina is married and has 4 children. She is a business woman, and a loan of $800 is offered to her to improve her business. Felismina lives in Dili. Most of her daily income is from her store, so she is still happy to do her business. She opened her business in 2001 with her own working capital of $700. She will add money to her principal amount to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as candies, nuts, dried fish, scissors, aqua, slippers and other things to sell, including soft drinks and hard drinks. It has become her activity, so she is happy to do her business every day. She will continue managing her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy candies, nuts, dried fish, scissors, aqua, slippers and other things to sell, including soft drinks and hard drinks.

loans.name: Maria Celia

texts.es: Maria de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su esposo,  desde hace 10  años se dedica a la crianza de ganado en la zona donde reside, y los comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos del hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más ganado que le permita crecer en el negocio y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 45 and lives in her own house with her husband and their four children. She has been raising livestock for 10 years in the area where she lives. She sells them in the neighbouring villages. She uses what she makes from her sales to cover some of the household costs.

Maria is asking for a loan to be able to buy more cows, which will help her grow the business and thus increase her income.

loans.use: to buy more cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy galvanized sheet, matts and pins to renew the roofing of her house.

loans.name: Uben

texts.es:
Uben tiene 53 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado su cónyuge y tres hijos menores de edad de 12, 5 y 3 años, vive en casa propia de material rustico un piso, él y su cónyuge son nacidos en caserío el pueblo lo hizo; vive en armonía familiar y en comunión con los miembros de su caserío, vive en la parte rural del caserío el pueblo lo hizo Distrito santo tomas; vive en una comunidad dedicada básicamente a la agricultura y ganadería, vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua.

La actividad que realiza Uben es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 2 has. Variedad catimor, plantación tiene tres años de edad, esta en primer año de producción y para 2015 estará en segundo año de producción; tiene terreno agrícola propio donde esta parcela de café, actividad la realiza hace 03 años en caserío el pueblo lo hizo Distrito Santo Tomás, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café ya que anteriormente a cultivado variedad catimor, producto lo vende en distrito Santo Tomas a compradores de la zona. Adicionalmente Uben se dedica a la actividad pecuaria cría de ganado vacuno y también al cultivo y productos de pan llevar todo esto lo realiza en terreno propio en caserío el pueblo lo hizo distrito santo tomas. El destino del crédito sera para mantenimiento de 2 has. De café en producción, con ello asegurara mayor y mejor producción para campaña 2015 y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Uben is 53 years old, has a stable home alongside his spouse, and has three underage children of ages 12, 5, and 3. He lives in his own, one-story house of rustic material. He and his spouse were born in a small village called “El Pueblo Lo Hizo” (in English, “The People Made It”). He lives in friendly harmony and communion with the members of his small village. He lives in the rural part of El Pueblo Lo Hizo in the St. Thomas district. He lives in a community that is dedicated mainly to agriculture and livestock breeding. His house has water.

Uben’s occupation is coffee farming, and to date he has 2 hectares. He farms the Catimor variety and his plantation is three years old. He is in his first year of production, and in 2015 he will be in his second year of production. He has his own agricultural land where the coffee plot is. He has been working in this occupation for 3 years in the village El Pueblo Lo Hizo in the St. Thomas district. He has experience in coffee farming, since in the past he has farmed the Catimor variety. The St. Thomas district sells this product to buyers in the area. Additionally, Uben makes a living in cattle breeding, and also in the farming of staple food crops. He does all of this on his own land in El Pueblo Lo Hizo in the St. Thomas district.

The purpose of the loan will be for the maintenance of 2 hectares of coffee in production. With the loan he will ensure more and better production for 2015. Consequently, he will obtain better income and will be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain 2 hectares of coffee in production. With the loan he will ensure more and better production for 2015.

loans.name: Scholastica

texts.en: Scholastica is 62 years old, married and, together with her spouse, has been blessed with 5 children. She is a farmer in Machakos town and she has been in this business for 20 years. She will be using this loan to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting on her farm. She will also buy a water pump for use on her farm. She will use the anticipated profits to buy more stock of seeds and fertilizer and buy another water pump. This is her first loan term with VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to expand her farming and be successful.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and a water pump.

loans.name: Oscar Mauricio

texts.es: Oscar de 31 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la crianza de cerdos y  a la agricultura,  comercializa los cerdos en los pueblos aledaños, con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Oscar vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar concentrado para los cerdos y asi poder continuar con la crianza de los mismo y tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Oscar is thirty-one years old. For the past 10 years, he has made a living raising pigs and farming. He sells his pigs in neighboring towns. With this income, he has been able to move forward in life and cover his home expenses.

Oscar lives in his own house together with his life partner and their two children. He is requesting a loan to buy pig feed and to thereby continue raising the pigs and making good profits.

loans.use: to buy feed for his pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items such as leather, thread, adhesive and materials.

loans.name: Hada Rubidia

texts.es: Hada de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en:
Hada is 52 years old and lives in a house of her own with her life partner.
She makes a living selling clothes at different markets and she has many loyal customers due to the good quality and prices she offers.
Hada is asking for a loan to buy clothing at wholesale so as to be able to continue selling and in this way improve her income.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Martha  Elena

texts.es: Martha de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes especialmente sus vecinos, Martha esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Martha is 43 and lives in her own house with her husband and their five children. She has worked selling tortillas for several years. Her business is run from her own home, and she has a lot of clients, especially amongst her neighbours.

Martha is asking for a loan to buy lime and quintals of corn so she can carry on making tortillas. In this way, she will be able to earn more and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy lime and quintals of corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Rosa Miriam

texts.es: Doña rosa se dedica desde hace 6 años al cultivo de caña de azucar, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene muchos clientes establecidos, Doña Rosa vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
For the past six years, Rosa has made a living growing sugar cane. She sells her products in neighboring towns where she has many established customers. Rosa lives with her husband and their three children in a house that they own. 

She is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticide, etc. so that she can improve her land, which is shown in the photograph. In doing this, she will be able to continue with her work and have a greater income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticide, etc. in order improve her lands.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.en: Fotima is married and has three children. She is a very smart woman. Fotima’s husband is a migrant in Russia. Fotima is a businesswoman. She has been busy buying and selling discs in a shop. She is a very sociable woman and she is able to make an individual approach to each customer. Thanks to her hard labor, her business is developing little by little. Fotima is asking for a loan of 2,000 Somoni to buy discs to increase her working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy discs to increase her working capital

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is 27 years old, married to Lucy and blessed with one child who is three years old. He has been selling men's socks for the last five years and earns a monthly income of KES 12,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES).
	 		
He has applied for his first loan of 5,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya and intends to use the loan to buy more stock of men's socks for sale 

Moses will use the anticipated profits to provide for the family's basic needs. He hopes to grow his business and open a bigger shop with a variety of clothing.

loans.use: to buy more stock of men's socks for sale

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 55 years old and married with four children. With one child in school, Aida works very hard to provide for them.

Aida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc..

Aida has been in this business for 3 years now. In the future, Aida would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
Celsa is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Celsa is 51 years old and has two children who are in school.

Celsa has a food vending business in the Philippines. Celsa requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Celsa has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, Celsa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Honey Celeste

texts.en:
Honey Celeste is 34 years old, married, and has six children. Five of her children are in school.

Honey Celeste is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Honey Celeste has been raising pigs for 5 years now, and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Honey Celeste would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es: María pertenece al grupo de Alcancía Comunal “DIVINO NIÑO JESÚS” está llevando el cargo de tesorera  el grupo tiene más de 5 años y está conformado por 6 personas que viven en la misma zona que se unieron  para poder crear la Alcancía Comunal. María tiene 58 años de edad es soltera. Se  dedica a la venta de  productos de belleza que poco a poco ha podido crecer; a la vez tiene ingresos adicionales de alquiler de cuartos. María cuenta que ha mejorado su calidad de vida ya que ahora tiene más ingresos de esta manera puede tener  una  mejor alimentación, educación y vestimenta. María invertirá en la compra ce productos  de belleza  para  su negocio. La Sra. María es la persona que se encuentra de pie al costado de las otras señoras.
texts.en:
María belongs to the “DIVINO NIÑO JESÚS” communal bank and has worked as the group treasurer for over 5 years. There are 6 people in the group, who all live in the same area and who came together to create the communal bank. María is 58 and single. She works selling beauty products, and she has gradually managed to grow her business. She also has an additional income from renting rooms out. She says that she has improved her quality of life as she now has a better income. In this way, she can afford better food, an education and clothing.

María will use the loan to invest in buying beauty products for her business. In the photo, she is the one standing next to the other women.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pesticide, etc. in order to improve the land.

loans.name: San Felipe De Jesus

texts.es:
San Felipe De Jesus tiene 49 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, vive con su conyugue y sus dos menores hijos, los cuales dos secundaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucará. Vive por más de 21 años en el mencionado distrito. Felipe De Jesus vive en la parte rural del distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad que Felipe De Jesus realiza es brindar servicios como operario de construcción (acentando de ladrillo, llenado de bases, tarrajeo entre otros). Él cuenta con 5 años dedicandose a esta actividad contando con clientela reconocida de la zona y de caserios aledaños, los servicios los realiza en Pucaraá asi como caserios aledaños, además se dedica a la sastreria ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el credito sin ningun problema. El destino del crédito sera para ivertir en su negocio en la compra de algunos instrumentos de construccion asi como comprar mas material para sastreria, con ello le generara mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
San Felipe De Jesus is forty-nine years old and lives in a house that he owns. He lives with his spouse and their two children, who attend the  national high school in Pucará. He has lived in this district for more than 21 years. He lives in a rural part of this district and has water and electricity services. The residents of this community make a living in agriculture, livestock and trade.

Felipe de Jesus offers construction services, like laying bricks, filling in cement bases, plastering, and others. He has been doing this work for five years and is well-known in his community and in the neighboring towns. He also works in tailoring, which provides him and his family with additional income; this will help ensure that he can pay back the loan. 

He will invest the loan in the purchase of materials for his construction and tailoring businesses. This will help him to earn a higher income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies and more materials for his tailoring business.

loans.name: Ashraf

texts.en:
Ashraf is a 23-year-old single young man from Khanyounis. Four years ago, he started his own project, a store for selling home products. He now has good experience in this field. Ashraf imports the home products from good sources to insure he sells good quality products.
 
Ashraf took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more items for his home products store to resell. This will help him to increase his sales and also his income. 

Ashraf appears in the photo in his store

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in his home products store

loans.name: Evarista

texts.es:
Evarista está actualmente trabajando en un hospital con un pequeño sueldo, se quedo a trabajar en ese lugar luego de culminar su pasantía . 
Ella está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, el cual le permitirá poder ser alguien en la vida, como así también poder ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su trabajo y sus conocimientos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Evarista is currently working at a hospital with a low salary. She stayed at that location and started working after completing her internship.
She is going to nursing school which will allow you to become someone in life one day, at the same time she'll be able to help others through her work and knowledge.
She is asking for a loan to pay for collage fees, and so be able to continue with her studies as she's done thus far.

loans.use: to pay for college fees

loans.name: Genifer

texts.en:
Genifer is 40 years old, married and lives with her family. She has a retail store serving several customers; she sells assorted groceries and beverages to generate additional income while her husband works as a construction worker.
 
Genifer has four years experience in this field. She is working hard every day in order to provide income for the family and to show customers her responsibility and reliability to serve. 

She requested this loan to buy additional goods and bottled products to sell to increase her sales. She is aiming to develop her business and increase her profits so that she may open a bigger place and continue assisting her family with the additional income.

loans.use: to buy additional goods and bottled products to sell to increase her sales.

loans.name: Gertrudis

texts.es:
Gertrudis con mucho sacrificio está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, espera llegar a  obtener  su título para trabajar más  y lograr obtener  mayor  ingreso para su familia. 
Gertrudis está casada, con mucho sacrificio está llegando a objetivo y  por esa razón se dedica mas mucho a sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa manera poder seguir luchando por alcanzar su meta como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Gertrudis is studying really hard to become a nurse. She hopes to get her degree to be able to earn a better income to help her family.
Gertrudis is married, and with great sacrifice she is reaching this goal, so she is very dedicated to her studies.
She is asking for this loan to pay for her college tuition, and thus to continue striving to reach her goal as she's done thus far.

loans.use: to pay for school fees.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maria Fe is 47 years old and has one child in school.

Maria Fe has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 2,900 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

Maria Fe has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
Georgina se levanta todos los días muy temprano para preparar la comida que venderá ese día en el mercado. A sus 49 años, esta mujer con más de 20 años de experiencia en este negocio de comidería familiar que inició su madre, trabaja fuerte cada día para apoyar en los gastos del hogar. Ella cuenta con el apoyo de su hermana y de uno de sus hijos, pues para ellos trabajar en familia es lo mejor.
Georgina tiene expectativas muy altas para ofrecer un mejor servicio. Por esta razón es que ella solicita un préstamo para mejorar el local, ampliarlo y para comprar herramientas de cocina. Este crédito le ayudará a mejorar la presentación del local y a qué sus clientes estén contentos. Entre sus planes está establecer otro local y comprar una vitrina donde pueda exhibir mejor su comida.
texts.en:
Georgina wakes up very early every day to prepare the food that she will sell that day in the market. At 49 years of age, this woman with more than 20 years of experience in this family cooking business that was started by her mother, works hard every day to support her household expenses. She has the support of her sister and one of her sons, since for them working with the family is best.

Georgina has very high expectations to offer a better service. This is the reason why she requests a loan to improve the stall, to enlarge it and to buy cooking utensils. This loan will help her to improve her stall's presentation and to make her customers happy. Her plans include opening another stall and buying a display case to better exhibit her food.

loans.use: to enlarge the stall and buy cooking utensils

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es abogado, trabaja en una universidad, comenta que su esposa también es abogada, ambos tienen un hijo pequeño, el cual es el motivo de sacrificio de ambos.
Actualmente Fernando esta haciendo una maestría en Derecho, lo cual le hará un mejor profesional con conocimientos mas amplios, lo que le ayudará a seguir creciendo como abogado, y le abrirá mas puertas al mundo laboral.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar su curso de maestría y de esa forma seguir cultivando sus conocimientos.
texts.en:
Fernando is a lawyer who works at a university. He says that his wife is also a lawyer. They have have a small son who is the reason why they both make sacrifices.

Currently, Fernando is doing a masters in law, which will make him a better professional with more extensive knowledge. This will help him to continue growing as a lawyer and will open more doors for him in the working world.

He is requesting a loan to pay for his masters course and, in this way, to continue cultivating his knowledge.

loans.use: to pay for his masters course.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo es de la ciudad de Villarrica, esta estudiando, y a la vez trabaja en su propio negocio que es una bodega de bebidas, es una persona muy sacrificada que se esfuerza por poder salir adelante.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniero agrónomo, y quiere poder aplicar todo lo que hace al campo y otras áreas. 
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
texts.en:
Pablo lives in the city of Villarrica. He goes to school while working in his own business, a beverage bodega. ,He is hard-working and strives to succeed.
He is studying agro engineering and he wants to apply everything he does to farming and other areas. He is asking for this loan to pay for college tuition fees.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.en: Sharofat, 10 years ago, began her business deal in Tajikistan. She is a very industrious woman and thanks to her hard labor, she had some success in the business. She has been busy growing agriculture products. She had grown crops at first and then she has began growing vegetables. Sharofat’s husband helps her grow vegetables. They sell the harvest in a local market. Sharofat and her husband have five children who are the motor of their life. Sharofat is going to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the new sowing season and with this aim, she is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and seeds for the new planting season

loans.name: Cesaria

texts.en: Cesaria, 46 years old, is married with four children.  She has her retail business to make more income for a living. Before, she often helped her husband peddling fish in their village. She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional grocery goods for her retail store. She hopes to expand her business and build a bigger shelter for her convenience store in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods for her retail store.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
This is Marilyn. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 12,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marilyn wants her business to grow bigger. She also hopes to be able to help her relatives who are in need. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 42 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico junto a su esposa y 02 hijos menores de edad. El domicilio de Juan se ubica en el Caserío PLAYA AZUL, en el distrito de Pucara en la provincia de Jaén – dpto: Cajamarca. La comunidad donde vive el cliente es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y dan buenas referencias personales y laborales.

La actividad que realiza Juan es la de vender animales menores; también es peón agrícola y arrienda 1,5 has para el cultivo de arroz. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en compra de cuyes, mejoramiento/acondicionamiento de corrales. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 42. He owns a home made with rustic materials with his wife and 2 small children. They live in Playa Azul, district of Pucara, Jaén province, Department of Cajamarca. This area is home to a small rural community where people know one another and can also vouch for each other, at a personal and business level.
Juan sells small farm animals; he is also a farm worker, leasing a 1.5 ha for rice cultivation. He will use this loan to invest in buying guinea pigs, and to improve and recondition their holding pens. This will allow him to increase revenue in a very short term, and thus improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, and to improve and recondition their holding pens

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with three children, one of whom attends school and other two who are still young. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past two years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan, she is requesting 20,000 KES to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Marleen

texts.en:
Marleen is a 19-year-old single young lady from Jenin City. She lives with her family in a simple house in the city. Her father is a taxi driver. He works long hours, but the income is low and unstable. Marleen is a student in business administration. She would like to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to help her family with part of their expenses.

Marleen requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking out this loan, Marleen will be able to do her homework and reports easily.

Marleen appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies

loans.name: Zhanna

texts.en:
This nice and exquisite lady’s name is Zhanna. She lives in the frontier village of Berkaber in the Tavush region with her son and daughter. Her son is a contractual military serviceman; since he works at the military unit at Nagorno Karabakh, he comes home twice a month to visit his mother and sister. 

Zhanna has a vocational education and for a short period of time worked as a saleswoman in a store, but now she is only busy with farming and agricultural occupations. With the great help of her daughter, Zhanna takes care of three pigs and cultivates a nice orchard full of sweet and colorful persimmons, peaches, plums and apples. Their income derives from the sale of meat and fruits. 

Zhanna has requested this loan to buy three piglets to become more seriously engaged in swine breeding; she will also buy a large quantity of fodder for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy three piglets and fodder for her cattle

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila tiene 61 años de edad, es viuda, vive con su hija, en casa propia, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de cayalti y goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y esta ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Luzmila se dedica a la actividad de servicio de costura de prendas de vestir, desde hace más de 20 años de antiguedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de telas para la confeccion de prendas de vestir. De esta manera hacer crecer mas su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 61. A widow, she lives with her daughter, and she owns her home, located in a large community in the urban area of Cayaltí. She has great personal and business references from her neighbors. Her community is dedicated mainly to agriculture, livestock and trade. It is located in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, north coast of Peru.
Luzmila is a seamstress. She's done this job for over 20 years right out of her home. She is asking for a loan to buy fabric for garment-making. This way, she can grow her business, get more income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric for garment-making

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia tiene 61 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, junto a su conyuge en el distrito de Morropón; distrito donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, como sustento principal, siembra y cosecha de arroz, banano, maíz, fréjol caupí. Etc. Su comunidada está ubicada en la provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Virginia es la venta de cerveza, chicha y comida,actividad que la realiza desde hace más de 10 años, en su mismo domicilio, ella es muy conocida en la zona con muy buenas referencias laborales y personales, además que su conyuge es agricultor teniendo ingresos adicionales para la unidad familiar Destino del crédito será para mejoras de casa y compra de cerveza y maiz(insumo para la elaboración de chicha). Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Virginia is 61 and lives in her own rustic house with her husband in the district of Morropón. People here work in agriculture and livestock, and their main livelihood is the sowing and harvesting of crops such as rice, banana, corn and black-eyed peas. The community is located in the province of Morropón in the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Virginia works selling beer, chicha (a traditional corn-based drink) and food, which she has done from her own home for over 10 years. She is well known in the area because of her excellent personal and professional qualities. Her husband is also a farmer, and adds another income to the family unit.

Virginia will use the loan to improve the house and buy beer and corn to make chicha. In the short term, this will allow her to improve her income, increase her profits and therefore better her quality of life as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to improve her house and to buy beer and corn to make chicha (a traditional corn-based drink).

loans.name: Bayan

texts.en:
Bayan is a 22-year-old single young lady from Jenin city. She lives with her family in a simple house in the city. Her father is a taxi driver who works long hours but his income is low and unstable. Bayan is a master's student who studies chemistry. She would like to take her master's degree and find a job in the future to help her family with part of their expenses.

Bayan requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Bayan will be able to do her homework and reports easily.

Bayan appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies

loans.name: Eleana Mercedes

texts.es:
Elena es una joven que no se deja llevar por los estereotipos de género, al contrario, muestra que las mujeres también pueden ser excelentes ingenieras y sin ningún problema. A sus 23 años de edad está cursando el cuarto año de Ingeniería en Sistemas de computación y se ha convertido en una de las mejores alumnas. 
Todos los sábados se levanta para caminar un paso más cerca de su graduación. No obstante, mientras está cerca de esa meta, solicita un préstamo para pagar la mensualidad de su universidad. Con este avancé podrá asegurar que tendrá su título como licenciada y muchas puertas en el mundo laboral se abrirán. En sus planes está especializarme en diseño de redes y montar su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Elena is a young woman who does not follow gender stereotypes. On the contrary, she shows that women can be excellent engineers without any problems. At 23 years old, she is in the fourth year of Computing Systems Engineering and has become one of the best students in her class. 

She gets up every Saturday to get one step closer to graduation. As she gets closer to her goal, she is requesting a loan to pay for her tuition. With this advance, she will ensure that she will get her diploma and many doors will open for her in the workforce. She plans to specialize in network design and open her own business.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en: Saleh is a second-year university student majoring in geography. After his father’s retirement, his brother started working to earn an income for the family. Because it will be hard for Seleh to immediately pay his semester fees, he is requesting an education loan for that purpose.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Lina Maria

texts.es:
Lina una mujer soltera de 42 años que encontró en su negocio de tienda- papelería su gran amante y a quien dedicar las horas de su vida, una mujer muy independiente en todo el término de la palabra que quiere a través de un crédito tener un nuevo servicio el cual es de fotocopias y compras más insumos para su tienda, ya que es sola, sin hijos sin pareja de lo único que vive es de su tienda y siempre tiene que hacer lo posible por tener buen volumen de ventas ya que todas las cuentas las paga ella y de verdad es difícil. 
Con la ayuda del crédito tendrá un servicio nuevo que atraerá más personas y pueden observar la variedad de productos que vende para en un futuro vuelvan. 
Lo más consentido para Lina es su hogar por eso trabaja para hacerlo bello y agradable a las visitas es su prioridad y esperar poder comprar cosas para adornarla.
texts.en:
Lina s 42. She is single, but she found love in her office supplies/craft store. She works long hours and she's very independent. She wants to use this loan to set up a new photo copy service and she also wants to add more supplies to her store. As she is single and has no children, she has time to devote to her store so she does everything possible to increase sales as this is her sole income and paying bills can become difficult.
With the help of this loan, she will be able to provide new services that will bring more customers in, that can also take advantage of a variety of new products she is also offering. 
Lina's most precious threat is her home, so she works hard to make it beautiful and pleasant for her visitors, so she hopes she can buy new embellishments for make it even better.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier and other office supplies for her store

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a persevering mother of three children.  She helped her husband cultivate their small parcel of land in which eggplant grows.  The income from their garden is enough to provide for their family's needs.  Esther loves to plant a variety of flowers which recently has given her income.  Aside from making her house attractive it also generates income that provides a big boost for daily expenses.
