Esther joined Paglaum Cooperative because members get the agri-farming training in addition to enjoying the financial assistance and benefit.  Esther will apply the amount of 4,000 PHP to purchase 5 bags of cement and sand for finishing her house.  Esther is very thankful to Paglaum and hopes that slowly she can renovate her house for comfortable living.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand for finishing her house

loans.name: Melania Del Socorro

texts.es:
Melania es una mujer trabajadora que poco a poco ha sacado su pulpería adelante gracias a su esfuerzo y a los préstamos anteriores con MiCrédito, KIVA y con todas las personas que han ido aportando. Ella se siente muy agradecida con esta ayuda, pues lo considera como un complemento de su crecimiento. En el último crédito pudo comprar pan, detergente, gaseosas, entre otros productos básicos. Ahora a sus 52 años de edad, ya tiene nueve años de estar en el negocio y dice que tan solo está comenzando.
Por esta razón solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar arroz, café, frijoles, azúcar, entre otros productos de gran demanda. Afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo económico de su hermana, quien manda remesas desde Costa Rica que ayudan mucho para sustentar el hogar. Por el momento quiere concentrarse en producir muchas ventas para pagar sin ningún problema, para después invertir en la comprar de una cocina industrial.
texts.en:
Melania is a hard working woman that little by little has gotten her grocery store ahead thanks to her effort and previous loans from MiCredito, Kiva and all the people that have contributed. She is thankful for this help, as she considers it to be a complement to her growth. With the last loan, she was able to buy bread, detergent, and soft drinks, among other basic products. Now at 52 years old, she has 9 years with her business and believes she is just beginning.

This is why she needs a new loan to buy rice, coffee, beans, and sugar, among other high-demand products. She fortunately has her sister's financial support, as she sends remittances from Costa Rica and these help immensely to support her household. At the moment, Melania wants to focus on having high sale volumes to pay back the loan without problems and subsequently invest in the purchase of an industrial kitchen.

loans.use: to buy rice, coffee, beans, and sugar, among other products.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda works hard to support her family. She is 51 years old and a married woman.  She has a general store business in the Philippines.

Rosalinda requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc.  She has been in this business for 30 years now.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Frida

texts.en:
Hello wonderful Kiva Lenders! Meet Frida, one of the most hardworking and dedicated women on planet earth. She is based in Iriga, a remote village in the Chuka area of Kenya. She is happily married to Kevin, who adds additional income to support their family. They are blessed with two lovely children. For the past 20 years she has been engaging in mixed farming, and through selling milk, eggs and a variety of food crops she has earned a decent income. Like many farmers in her village, she also plants trees on her farm to complement the region's natural forests. 

Although Frida makes profits selling her farm produce at the market, the biggest challenge she faces is lack of water to irrigate her farm and water for home consumption. Frida comes from an area where there is no water connection and she is always forced to walk for a long distance for this “precious commodity." Frida faces challenges carrying water on her back because of her failing health, and she is quickly aging. Frida is seeking a loan to buy a water tank and water pipes. Most of the farmers in Kenya depend on rain-fed agriculture but Frida wants to change that notion and start irrigation farming. Through the loan she intends to harvest rain water (which always goes to waste) and store it in the tank. She intends to buy pipes that will be used to pump water from the river directly to her farm. With your loan, Frida will be saved the trouble of walking a long distance in search of water, and she will have enough water for home consumption. Irrigating her farm will boost productivity since water is an important requirement in the germination of crops.

Frida is very excited about this project and hopes her dream will be achieved through the loan from Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders. Increased productivity means increased income and this will translate to improved living standards. She will use the additional income to improve and secure the future of her children. Frida’s hope for the future is to live a fulfilling life.

loans.use: To purchase a water tank and water pipes.

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en: Kholoud is a conservative married woman who asked her husband to appear in this photo in her place. She and her husband have a livestock business which is how they support their family's seven members. They went into this line of work three years ago with a few sheep and have since increased the size of their flock. Their main challenge is finding good quality feed for their animals. Kholoud is applying for a loan to buy more sheep and food for them to eat.

loans.use: to buy more sheep and food for them to eat.

loans.name: Carlos Ivan

texts.es: Carlos  de 32 años de edad se dedica desde hace 7 años al cultivo de yuca, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, Carlos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Carlos is 32 years old and has been cultivating cassava for seven years. He sells his products at different markets located near his house. Carlos lives in his own home along with his life companion and their two children.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and other supplies so that he can improve the land that is shown in the photograph. As a result, he can continue his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more olive seedlings for the family farm.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a single mother of five children. None of them go to school. She has a business selling charcoal at the market on a retail basis, and has been in this business for 10 years. She has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 Ugandan Shilling (UGX) from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal. She works from home seven days a week. She generates additional income from renting rooms. Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. She aspires to buy land for farming and to build more rental rooms. She decided to join MCDT SACCO because of timely loans. She resides in the family house. The family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include paying utility bills, and food for the family.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Mikocheni Group

texts.en:
Rose, who is in her late 50s, is a widow with three grown-up children. She has a grandchild who is still in school. She has been running several projects, like mamalishe (food vending/cafe), selling charcoal, and selling beers and local brew, for twenty years now. She works from 8:00 am to 11:00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be one of Rose's many loans she has taken from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase the food stock, and started selling charcoal, beers, local brew and soft drinks. She has paid back all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loans and appreciates Kiva for supporting her group. She used the profits to pay school fees for her grandchild, bought a plot of land and built her house, saved some in the bank and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to to restock the out of stock items in her mamalishe business, to buy sacks of charcoal to resell and to buy beers, soft drinks and local brew to meet her customers' demand. She dreams of making her business grow.

Rose will share this loan with her loan group "Mikocheni" which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in mamalishe business,and buy soft drinks, beers, etc to resell

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida is 34 years old and married.  She lives in Mitimos, Rizal, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. In order to earn a living she takes in and raises pigs from her neighborhood.  The piglets' owners share in the profit upon sale, to be divided 60/40 or 70/30 depending on their agreement.  With a desire to earn more, Loida decided to raise pigs on her own as well. 

Through Pauglam PC she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 7,000 PHP to buy additional feed. She really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, in addition to the income of her husband. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed and additional piglets

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is married and the mother of three children, two of whom are in school. She works hard to support her family by making doormats in the Philippines. She has  requested a PHP 30,000 loan from NWTF to buy fabric and other materials to make new mats to sell. She has been in this business for 15 years. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
A sus 57 años de edad Luis se siente motivado y apoyado para iniciar su propio negocio que será pionero en su sector residencial el cual será una empresa de embutidos, este negocio lo ha pensado mucho en montarlo y el único inconveniente que tenía era los altos costos de los insumos y maquinaria por lo que se apoyara en interactuar para montar el negocio y sabe que no solo le desembolsaran el dinero si no que le harán un acompañamiento para invertir bien su capital.
Con el crédito comprara la maquinaria necesaria e insumos que sería carne para preparar, jamón, salchichas, salchichón y demás embutidos y distribuirlos en tiendas y mini mercados que lo quieran apoyar. 
Es un hombre separado que actualmente está en su casa sin hacer nada y necesita rápidamente un ingreso de dinero, quiere mejorar su calidad de vida ya que por su edad no podrá encontrar empleo y lo que más le gusta es ser su propio Jefe
texts.en:
57-year-old Luis is motivated and has received a lot of support to start his own business, which will be the first of its kind in this residential area. He's talking about a sausage company. He's given a lot of thought to the starting of this business, being his only downside, the high costs of inputs and machinery, so he's leaning on Interactuar for support, as he knows that not only they will help him by lending him the money, but they will also follow up with him and help him invest the money. 
With this loan, he will buy the necessary equipment and supplies, such as beef, ham, sausage, salami and other sausages for product making that he will  distribute in stores and mini markets that want to support him.
He is currently separated, and he's home without a job, so he desperately needs a source of income. He wants to improve his quality of life, but due to his age he can't find a job. Besides, he would like to be his own boss at this time.

loans.use: to buy machinery and supplies for sausage making

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
A sra Amelia, tem 35 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de duas filhas menores que frequentam o ensino primário. Para além destas, sustenta a sua sobrinha que também frequenta o ensino primário. De salientar que a sua base de sustento é o negócio. Ela trabalha todo o dia na sua mini-mercearia.
Com o empréstimo, pretende comprar produtos alimentares diversos como arroz, farinha de milho, açúcar, óleo da cozinha, folha de chá para revender na sua mini- mercearia. 
O seu sonho é ter  uma mercearia um pouco maior  recheiada de todos os produtos básicos e segura, visto que a que tem é pequena e não está gradeiada, bem como construir dependências para arrendar como outra fonte de sustento.
O desafio é reembolsar o crédito rapidamente, pese embora, os seus clientes não honram pontualmente com compromissos, isto é, levam os produtos com a promessa de pagar no final de mês e na hora de pagar não o fazem.
texts.en: Amelia, age 35, is a single mother of two daughters who are both in elementary school. In addition to them, she also provides for her niece, who attends school as well. She points out that the basis of her livelihood is her business; she works every day in her mini-grocery store. With this loan, she plans to buy various food products like rice, corn flour, sugar, cooking oil, and tea leaves for resale in her mini-grocery.  Her dream is to have a little bigger store that is well stocked with all kinds of basic needs products and is more secure, as her current small store doesn't have grating on the windows. She also dreams of building out some rooms for rent as an additional source of income. Her priority will be to repay this loan quickly, even though her customers often do not meet their payment plans on time at the end of the month.

loans.use: to buy various food products like rice, corn flour, sugar, cooking oil, and tea leaves for resale.

loans.name: Mitchie

texts.en:
Mitchie is a 36-year-old married woman and a mother of four children, from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is engaged in dried fish vending in her place. Her husband works as a fisherman. Mitchie is standing next to fishing nets, which her husband uses for fishing. This is the source of their income.
Mitchie is asking for a loan to buy more fish for drying. With this, she will be able to dry more fish, which she will sell to the nearest market in her place.
In the future, Mitchie hopes to make their fishing business sustainable and productive. She also wants to save money for the future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more fish for drying

loans.name: Pastora

texts.en: Pastora is 66 years old and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is a widow with six children, and runs a store where she sells different kinds of goods. She has been in this business for 28 years and raised her children through hard work. Pastora has requested a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as salt, oil, and sugar. Her goal is to increase her income so that she can meet the needs of her family because her children are completely dependent on her for support. She has been a member of PMPC for the last six years. Her goal for the future is to go into new lines of business so she can increase her income.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities such as salt, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Hector Adan

texts.es: Hector de 49 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la crianza de ganado lechero y de repasto, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de novillos de repasto para continuar con la crianza y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Hector is 49 years old and has been dedicated to raising milk cows and steers for some 20 years now. He sells his products in neighboring villages and already has established customers who prefer his products for their quality and good prices.

Hector is requesting a loan to buy young steers to continue raising them and, thus, to be able to enjoy a better income.

loans.use: to purchase young steers to raise.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is 44 years old, married and together with her spouse, has been blessed with two children. She is a dairy farmer and has been in this business for 10 years. She plans to use this loan to buy dairy cows. She will use the anticipated profits to open a dairy shop. This is her first loan from VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to expand her farming business, make more income and be able to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en: Luciana earns a living from selling goods in her retail store to make a living. She has been doing this for many years and she earns well. She has improved the business. Her earnings go for their daily family expenditures. To have more stocks to offer, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy more grocery goods for her retail store in order to raise more profits. She hopes to have more returns in order to generate additional income for the purpose of providing a better education to her family.

loans.use: to buy more grocery goods for her retail store in order to raise more profits

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina is 65 years old and widowed with 6 children. She is a cash crop farmer and has been in this business for 10 years. She will be using this loan to buy fertilizer, maize seeds and orange seedlings for planting in her farm. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her farming. This is her first loan term with VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to expand her farming and be successful in farming.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, maize seeds and orange seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 54 years old and married with five children. Carmelita works very hard to provide for them.

Carmelita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 25,000 Philippines Pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like canned goods, seasonings, noodles, shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, and other items to sell.

Carmelita has been in this business for 40 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, seasonings, noodles, shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, and other items. 

Carmelita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like canned goods, seasonings, noodles, shampoo, detergent soap, coffee, and other items to sell

loans.name: Jhon Freddy

texts.es:
Jhon un hombre de 36 años de edad que quiere iniciar su negocio de venta de ropa y bisutería para los prestadores que no conozcan el término de bisutería son accesorios artesanales como aretes, manillas, pulseras, collares, fabricados en materiales no lujosos.
Jhon se vio en la necesidad de buscar alguna fuente de dinero ya que es desempleado y tiene un hijo de 5 años por el cual responder y vio la oportunidad perfecta para montar su propio negocio y lanzarse al mundo del emprendimiento.
Con el crédito iniciara formalmente su negocio comprando ropa y artículos de bisutería en general. 
Su gran sueño es mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Jhon is 36 and he wants to start a business selling clothes and jewelry, specifically, handmade accessories like earrings, bracelets, bangles, necklaces, made with simple materials.
Jhon is in the need to find a source of income as he is unemployed and he has a 5-year-old boy. He saw the perfect opportunity to start his own business and jump into the world of entrepreneurship.
With this loan, he will formally start the business by buying clothing and jewelry in general.
His dream is to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to start a business selling clothes and handmade jewelry

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is a 32-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Desiree has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her fish stall.

Desiree has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Petrocenia

texts.en: Petrocenia is married and the mother of seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur who is 41 years old and has four children currently in school. She runs a business making hollow blocks and has requested a PHP 16,000 loan from NWTF to buy supplies such as sand and cement. Petrocenia has been in this line of work for 18 years. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Enoque

texts.pt:
O senhor Enoque e assistente tecnico da agricultura tem 31 anos de idade, pai de 2 filhos  ainda menores vive na casa propria e nao sustenta ninguem alem de seus filhos.
Diz que com o valor vai comprar areia, pedra, chapas de zinco para ampliar a sua casa com mais um quarto, uma cozinha e e uma sala actualmente é tipo dois.
Projectos para o futuro  terminar a construcao de sua casa uma vez que actualmente so fez dois quartos onde vive  e quer fazer uma sala.
Diz comprometer se a pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar mais empréstimos e que além de seu trabalho tem uma lanchonete onde vende diversos produtos.
texts.en: Enoque, age 31, is an assistance agricultural technician and the father of two children, both of whom are school-aged and live with him in his own house. His children are his sole dependents. He says that with this loan he will buy gravel, stone, and sheet metal to expand his house with an additional bedroom, a kitchen, and a living room from its current footprint as a two-room house. Future projects include finishing with the construction project so he can have more than two rooms to live in. He is committed to making his payments on time and returning to take out more loans in the future. In addition to his main job, he also runs a stall where he sells a variety of goods.

loans.use: to buy gravel, stone, and sheet metal.

loans.name: Yesenia Del Carmen

texts.es: Yesenia de 36 años de edad se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su casa, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de productos y los buenos preciso, es madre soltera y vive en casa propia con su hija, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como cosméticos, esmaltes, ganchos para el cabello, shampoo, tientes para el cabello, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 36 years old and she sells personal care items. She runs this business from the market that is close to her home.  She has a lot of customers due to the variety of products that she sells at good prices.

She is a single mother and lives in her own home with her daughter.

She is seeking a loan so that she can purchase more products such as cosmetics, nail polish, hair accessories, hair dye, shampoo, etc. in order to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, nail polish, hair accessories, hair dye, etc.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.pt:
O Sr. Bernardo de 35 anos de idade casado e pai de 2 filhos 1 esta a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e a outra e menor de idade para frequentar a escola, sustenta seu irmao que esta a frequentar a escola no ensino secundario. Ele è operario Agricola.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (blocos, cimento, pedra e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade com a construcao da sua casa.
texts.en:
Bernardo is a 35-year-old married father of 2 children, one of whom attends primary school and the other is of pre-school age. He also supports his sister who attends secondary school. Bernardo is a farm worker.
This loan will be used to buy building materials (blocks, cement, stone and labour costs) in order to continue with building work on his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials (blocks, cement, stone and labour costs).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fishing nets and driftnet.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta is 28 years old and married with two school-age children.  She lives in Ventura, Sapang Dalaga, Philippines.  She helps her husband with the income from her garden. Julieta became a member of Paglaum Cooperatives last September because of the financial assistance, savings and insurance, which she appreciates the most.  Recently, Julieta applied for a loan to buy a knapsack sprayer for easy administration of pesticides and fertilizers.  Julieta started saving with Paglaum for her two children and hopes for a parcel of land to cultivate.

loans.use: to buy a knapsack sprayer for easy administration of pesticides and fertilizers

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en: For the last six years, Dorothy has earned a living by running a retail shop. She is 44 years old, married and the mother of four children. She has requested a loan to buy more goods such as flour, cooking fat, rice and sugar to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her business. This is her first loan from VisionFund Kenya. In the future she hopes to expand her business so she can become financially stable

loans.use: to buy more items to sell.

loans.name: Jennylyn

texts.en:
Jennylyn has four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jennylyn is 35 years old and all of her children are in school.

Jennylyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients and raw products for her food business.

Jennylyn has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jennylyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and raw products for her food business

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is a married woman with one child in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 38 years old now.

Leonila has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Leonila has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and lining material to make her own line of clothing.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
Desde el año 2009 la señora María encontró la fórmula para sentirse útil y poder generar sus propios ingresos y lo logro gracias a la venta de mercancía como productos de uso personal, María es una responsable, trabajadora y servicial madre de 56 años de edad, casada con tres hijos ya mayores de edad y se enorgullece de no tener que pedir dinero a nadie pues ella misma se consigue el capital para darse sus caprichos y para llevar para comer. 
Solicita un crédito para iniciar la venta de nuevos productos como ropa, y zapatos ampliando su portafolio de oferta luchando por ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
In 2009, Maria found the perfect way to feel useful and generate her own income by selling personal care products. Mary is a responsible, hardworking and helpful mother. She is 56, married with three grown children. She is proud she doesn't have to ask for money from anyone because she is making money for her guilty pleasures and to put food on the table.
She is asking for this loan to start selling new products such as clothing, shoes and expanding her portfolio as she works hard to become a great entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy personal care products.

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en: Duaa is a 20-year-old single lady. Both of her parents are working hard to provide their children the best education and living conditions. Now Duaa is in her third year at the university, majoring in nursing due to her interest in looking after sick people. Duaa is applying for a loan to help her pay the rest of her semester fees.

loans.use: to help her pay the rest of her semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees for her son, who wants to pursue a bachelor's degree, majoring in Finance and Banking.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
A Sr. Ana de 31 anos de idade solteira e mae de 2 filhos que estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario. Ela è funcionaria do Estado a mais de 5 anos.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (chapas de zinco, tinta para pintura da casa e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade a sua casa.
Tem como grande desafio terminar a sua casa e melhorar as condicoes da dieta almentar do seu filho.
texts.en: Ana, age 31, is a single mother of two children, both of whom attend elementary school. She has been a state employee for over five years. This loan will go toward buying construction material such as sheet metal and paint, and to paying construction labor for ongoing work on her house. Her main challenge is in finishing with the work on her house and improving her children's diet.

loans.use: to buy construction material such as sheet metal and paint, and to pay construction labor for ongoing work on her house.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El grupo de Mujeres San Cayetano, es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, ellas son unidas y solidarias entre ellas, trabajan juntas en actividades, se sienten con el apoyo del programa de comité de mujeres con lo que van a ir mejorando por medio de las capacitaciones.
La Sra. Maria es la presidenta del grupo, ella vive con su hija, es por ella que esta luchando para poder darle una buena crianza,  todos en la casa colaboran en el desarrollo y el crecimiento del nivel de vida de la familia. Maria tiene un kiosko, el cual es el sostén de la casa y de la familia.
La Sra. Solicita  este préstamo para invertir en su negocio que es un kiosko  ya que quiere poder surtirlo con golosinas, bebidas, comestibles, y demás, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Ella esta agradecida por la oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The women’s group called “San Cayetano” is from the city of San Ignacio. They are close-knit and supportive of one another since they work together in their activities. With the support of the Women’s Committee Program, the members will be able to improve as a result of their training.

Sra. Maria is the president of the group. She lives with her daughter. For this reason, she strives to provide her with a good upbringing. Everyone in her household helps one another to develop and grow in their standard of living as a family. Maria has a kiosk, which helps to support her household and her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to invest in her kiosk business. Maria wants to stock it with snack foods, beverages, food products, and other items so that she can continue her sales as before. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received since it will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, beverages, food products, and other items in order to continue her sales.

loans.name: Azelia

texts.pt:
A Sra. Azelia  de 40 anos de idade casada e mae de 3 filho que estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario. Ela è empacotadora na empresa de producao de banana a mais de 6 anos
O presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (chapas de zinco, tinta para pintura da casa e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade a sua casa.
Tem como grande desafio terminar a sua casa e melhorar as condicoes as condicoes de vida da sua familia.
texts.en: Azelia, age 40, is married and has three children, all of whom attend elementary or high school. She has been a packer at a banana company for over six years. This loan will go toward buying construction material, such as sheet metal and paint, and to paying for construction labor to continue work on her house. Her main challenge is in finishing with the construction work and improving the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy construction material, such as sheet metal and paint, and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Fabian Saturnino

texts.es: Fabián de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, sus dos hijas y su nieta, el tiene un pequeño taller ubicado en su casa donde fabrica prendas de oro, tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad con que los elabora y siempre al gusto de los clientes,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de herramientas, pinzas, oro, etc. para continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Fabián is 55 years old and lives in his own house with his wife, their two daughters, and his granddaughter. He has a small shop in his home where he makes gold jewelry. He has many regular customers due to the quality of his work and because his makes everything to their liking.

He is seeking a loan so that he can buy tools, tweezers, gold, etc. in order to continue his work, which earns him a good living.

loans.use: to buy tools, tweezers, gold, etc.

loans.name: Filomeno

texts.en: Filomeno was fortunate with the needed capital when he joined PMPC in 2011. He has three children who are all in their adult age. He knew this would be his last opportunity to get back on his feet when he failed after his first business went bad. PMPC to Filomeno came as a rescue for lending him money when he needed it badly. Now, he availed another loan for this quarter's cropping. He borrowed an amount to pay for bags of fertilizer and herbicides to maximize production on his rice farm and to be able to generate more income. Filomeno perseveres and always believes in reaching his goals to abundantly provide for his family.

loans.use: to pay for bags of fertilizer and herbicides to maximize production on his rice farm and to generate more income

location.town: Tangub-Lorenzo Tan, Tangub City, Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en:
Emilia is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Emilia is 36 years old and has two children who are in school.

Emilia has a ice cream vending business in the Philippines. Emilia requested a loan of 22000 PHP through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her ice cream vending business.

Emilia has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Emilia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her ice cream vending business

loans.name: Luvisminda

texts.en:
Luvisminda is 63 years old and married with three children.  

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Luvisminda requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She has been in the pig fattening business for eight years now and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Luvisminda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha works hard to support her family. She is married and has a gravestone-making business in the Philippines.

Juditha requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business. She has been in this business for 30 years now.

Juditha would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. She is a married woman and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Victoria requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like beverages, eggs, shampoo, etc.

Victoria has been in this business for 13 years now.

In the future, Victoria would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like beverages, eggs, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is 46 years old and she lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. She is a widow and alone she brought up two very clever and laborious boys. Her elder son works as an accountant at a private company and her smallest son is a student at the Yerevan State Economical University. Narine herself has a specialty of accounting and she works simultaneously at three places (at the three different schools) of her specialty. As Narine says, she likes her work since it allows her to provide her sons with good living conditions. She does it with pleasure and she could do even more except for her health problems, which are new and very unfamiliar to her. As she says, she is a little bit afraid of her new feelings, which disturb her concentration and ability to work thoroughly.

She will be very thankful to have this Kiva loan, which will help her to pass a medical examination and find out her health problems.

loans.use: to pay for a medical examination and find out her health problems

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married and a mother of five. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She sells green groceries to her neighbors and people passing by. She mentioned seasonality as the major challenge.

She always struggles to improve her grocery stall, trying to sell more and save money in order to have a more formal establishment. She is requesting a loan of KES 10,000 to purchase beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, tomatoes, and onions. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, tomatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Esmalita

texts.en:
Esmalita is 42 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Esmalita works very hard to provide for her family.

Esmalita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Esmalita has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, candies, soft-drinks, etc. 

Esmalita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mirlina

texts.en:
Mirlina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish/dried fish vending business in the Philippines.

Mirlina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 8 years now.

Mirlina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es: Jose de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la venta de comida su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logar salir adelante, el quiere mejor su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografia, pero no tiene de suficiente capital para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar ladrillos, cemento, arena, laminas, polines, puertas y pago de mano de obra para que el y su esposa puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Jose is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He sells food and his business is located in his house.  With the money that he earns selling food, he has been able to get by.  

He wants to improve his house by building a room in the space that you see in the photo. He doesn't have sufficient capital to build it and this is why he is seeking a loan. He will buy bricks, cement, sand, boards, poles, door, and pay for workers. He wants to do this so that he and his wife can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, boards, poles, doors, and to pay workers.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is 63 years old and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is widow with 9 children. She has a sari-sari store and she has operated this business for 5 years. As a single mother, she needs to work harder to support the needs of her children. She requested a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like noodles, canned goods and milk for more sales and to meet the demands of her customers. In the future, Erlinda dreams of engaging in a new business to earn more.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like noodles, canned goods and milk

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Concepcion, Iloilo. She is engaged in selling snack foods like roasted peanuts. She also sells frozen goods like pork sausages and other goods.
 
Zenaida is asking for a loan to buy more peanuts and frozen goods like pork sausages. This will enable her to improve her business as well as her income.
 
In the future, Zenaida hopes to improve her business so that it will generate more revenue that necessary for her family's needs and for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more peanuts and frozen goods like pork sausages

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 56 years old. He is married to Agnes, and together they have been blessed with 11 children, of ages between 32 and 4 years.

Samuel is a farmer. He loves his business, because he has seen his children being nourished and his family being provided for, through it. He has been farming for the last 31 years, earning a monthly income of KES 20,000.

Samuel has requested his third loan with VisionFund Kenya, of KES 60,000. He will use it to buy farm inputs, especially seeds and fertilizers for his farm. He successfully repaid his previous loans.

With the anticipated profits, Samuel will be able to repay his loan as well as educate his children. His hope and dream for the future is to be successful in life and self-sufficient.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, especially seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is single and has a handicraft business in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more raw materials for her business. Marivic has been in this business for 3 years.

In the future, Marivic would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa is 61 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Nimfa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Nimfa has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, fabric conditioner, cooking oil, toothpaste, etc. 

In the future, Nimfa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is 32 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Mercedita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell.

Mercedita has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, juice, noodles, etc. 

Mercedita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 58 years old and married with three children. With one child in school, Gloria works very hard to provide for them.

Gloria runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a loan of 6000 PHP through NWTF. This is to purchase additional items to sell, like canned goods, beverages, shampoo, etc.

Gloria has been in this business for 30 years. 

In the future, Gloria would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell, like canned goods, beverages, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el posee un taller mecánico y eléctrico desde hace 4 años ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos eléctricos para vehículos por mayor para tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio is 40 years old and lives in his own home along with his wife and their two children. He has a mechanical and electrical repair shop that he has been operating out of his house for the past four years. With the money he earns from his work, Julio is able to cover some of his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy electrical parts for vehicles in bulk so that he can earn a better income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy electrical parts for vehicles in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of meat to sell.

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en:
Mildred, the breadwinner in her family, is making a profit through her sari-sari (general store) store business. She is 35 years old and single. She never gets tired of tending her store. Her passion is selling, and she earns a meager income from it that is sufficient to support her family. 

Mildred is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing, without records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventories and sales. Mildred continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the determination to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventories and sales

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Amelita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Amelita would like to build and expand her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Qasem

texts.en: Qasem is now 22 years old and in his fourth year at the university, majoring in Psychology. Qasem has taken a previous loan that helped him to finish his third year of school. During this time, one of his brothers has started working to help the family. HIs brother works in a medical center, as an office boy. Still, it is hard on the family to support Qasem's schooling fees. For that, Qasem is asking for another loan in order to pay the semester fees.

loans.use: to pay the semester fees.

loans.name: Maulid

texts.en:
Maulid is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over twenty years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the 50,000 KES she wants to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu in order to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Angela una trabajadora, creativa y guerrera mujer que con sus ideas quiere ser auto-sostenible y nunca llegar a necesitar de otra persona por eso quiere aprovechar la oportunidad que le brinda Interactuar para iniciar su negocio de cría de cerdos, pollos, y gallinas ponedoras buscando un ingreso para su hogar.
Angela es una joven de 24 años y no quiere ser una campesina que solo vive con lo necesario quiere tener capital para el día que tenga hijos traerlos a un mundo a vivir y no a pasar necesidades que es su meta.
texts.en:
Angela is a hardworking, creative woman who wants to support herself using her own ideas so she doesn't have to ever rely on anybody else. 
That's why she wants to take advantage of the support of Interactuar to start her own business raising pigs, chickens, and laying hens to she can increase her income.
Angela is 24 and she doesn't want to end up as a farmer living paycheck to paycheck, she wants to have a better job so, one day she can provide her children with a better future, so they don't have to go through hard times.

loans.use: to start her own business raising pigs, chickens, and laying hens

loans.name: Domingo Jose

texts.es:
El señor Domingo, hombre trabajador con grandes deseos de superación, labora como jardinero para una empresa privada, su esposa es comerciante y entre los dos contribuyen con los gastos del hogar, tiene tres hijos pequeños.
solicita este crédito para la compra de Bloques, Cemento, Arena ya que construirá la pared detrás de su vivienda ya que aun esta con madera y lamina, el junto a su familia están muy contento ya que gozaran de mayor seguridad y mejores condiciones, Agradece el apoyo que kiva y Afodenic le están brindando con este primer crédito y espera seguir trabajando con nosotros ya que tiene muchas metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Domingo is a hard-working man with big dreams of improvement.  He works as a gardener for a private company. His wife works in sales and they both contribute to the household expenses.  They have 3 small children.

He is seeking a loan in order to buy bricks, cement, and sand to build a wall at the back of their house. It is currently built with wood and boards. He and his family are very happy, but a new wall will provide better security and better conditions.

He is thankful to the Kiva lenders and Afodenic for providing him with his first loan. He hopes to continue working with us as he has many goals he would like to achieve.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Segundo Adriano

texts.es:
Segundo Adriano es casado, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en este mismo en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Segundo Adriano se dedica a brindar servicios de albañilería, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, el mismo que esta ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para compra de isumos como cemento y yeso, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo Adriano is married with a son. He lives in a rural area in the district of Oyotún, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, north coast of Peru. This community is dedicated mainly to agriculture, livestock and trade.
Segundo Adriano provides masonry services, he owns a variety of tools and has over 10 years of experience in the business. He works right out of his home. He is asking for a loan to purchase supplies such as cement and plaster, that are greatly needed in this field; he wants to improve his services to make more money and increase in earnings, so he can have a better quality of life for his and his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as cement and plaster

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es:
Fermin tiene 64 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Fermin se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, huevos, menestras, etc; con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de más mercadería, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, con gran influencia en el negocio; cliente piensa tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Fermin is 64 years old. He lives with his son in the district Oyotún, a rural area, his neighbors are mostly engaged in agriculture, commerce and farming. This is part of the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region, North Coast of Peru.
Fermin sells groceries such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, eggs, beans, etc; with over 10 years experience in business, located out of his household, he is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise, to increase sales that he can reinvest in the business; he is thinking about increasing his stock of products to meet more diverse needs, requirements and tastes of the customers in the area.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise, to increase sales

loans.name: Raymund

texts.en:
Raymund sends you his thanks for your generosity, because his previous loan entrenched his business. He was able to purchase additional grocery products that he needed, to increase his inventory. The loan also helped him provide for his family’s daily needs.

He is very positive that he could improve more his business, if you will lend him an amount of 15,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional groceries, toiletries and beverages. His customers will be likely to buy more items, if he has more products displayed an his store. An increase on sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, with the result that his business will become more viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, he could sustain the needs of his family.

Aside from growing his business, Raymund wants to continue helping his relatives who are in need. He also hopes to open another outlet, sooner. He meets every week with his co-fellowship members* to share stories of his work, and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.


* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in his store.

loans.name: Emmy

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Emmy, a mother of four, from Kapsowar, a remote village town in the Rift Valley province of Kenya. She has spent the past 10 years of her life farming. She sells milk and vegetables produced on her farm. She also engages in personal business to make ends meet.

Emmy is a go-getter and has a great desire to succeed in life. Of all the activities she involves herself in, dairy farming is closest to her heart. She enjoys waking up every morning to go and milk her cows and feed them with fodder that has a high nutrient value. She is so keen and close with her cows, she has named one of them Teta. Milking Teta makes Emmy very proud, and she feels fulfilled.

Dairy farming is a very profitable business venture, and Emmy wants to take full advantage of it. She would like to expand her dairy business, but the biggest challenge she faces is a lack of capital to grow her business. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy a quality breed of dairy cow.

Emmy has planted Napier grass, and feeding the cows will never be a challenge. She also owns an expansive piece of land, and the excess space will be productively used when she acquires the additional dairy cow. The exotic cow she will buy will produce between 10 and 15 litres of milk per day, and this will translate to more income and profits. The profits from milk sales will allow Emmy to grow her business further. She will start to package milk and to process it into dairy products such as cream, yoghurt, and cheese. In addition, she will benefit from the organic manure from the cow. She projects that she will be able to start a biogas plant at her farm, which will save her money on fuel costs.

With your loan, all that Emmy dreams of is a secure future for her children. Emmy awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy  a quality breed of dairy cow

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a 46-year-old married woman. She has eight children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Lucia has a fruit farm in the Philippines. She has requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lucia has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Lucia would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en: Fernanda sells vegetables. She is married, and she has 2 children. She is requesting a loan of $600.00 to improve her business. She will use this loan to buy more vegetables, which she will bring to the market to sell. She started to selling vegetables in 2000 with her own working capital of $200.00. Now she is taking this loan from Tuba Rai Metin, because she wants to buy more vegetables, such as onions, garlic, chili, and other things to sell. Everyday she sells vegetables, because she is earning a good income from it.

loans.use: To buy onions, garlic, chili, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past two years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door, to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business, in the future.

With the loan that she is requesting of KES 20,000, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans, to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Olger David

texts.es: Olger es un hombre de 27 años de vida que quiere darle un cambio radical a su estilo de vida dejar de depender de una persona, trabajar por un sueldo mediocre, tener un estilo de vida que en muchas ocasiones no es digno por los bajos ingresos que tiene, Olger se cansó de todo esto y ahora quiere iniciar su empresa, su coraje y determinación son los que lo llevaran a triunfar según él, quiere montar un negocio de cría de cerdos y pollos y para ello quiere contar con su apoyo, el desea que crean en él que puede iniciar un negocio y sostenerlo con el tiempo, quiere ser su propio jefe y tener una excelente calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Olger is 27 and he wants to make a radical change in his lifestyle. He doesn't want to have to rely on someone else any longer and work for a mean salary. He doesn't want to live a life that's not worthy at times due to a low income. 
Olger is tired of all this, so he wants to start his own company, with courage and determination that will lead him to success. He wants to start a business raising pigs and chickens, so he's asking for your support. He wants people to believe in him, as he knows he can start this business and support it over time. He wants to be his own boss and have an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: to start his own company raising pigs and chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Silveria

texts.en:
Silveria, age 62, is from Tangub City, Philippines. She is married and has three children. Silveria joined PMPC, and she appreciates the programs and services of the Coop. The Coop supported her by providing the capital to start her barbecue-selling business, helping the family survive. Fortunately, her barbecue station is located in a populous neighborhood, so she makes promising sales every day. Silveria keeps on running the business well, even though there is increased competition from another eatery. She believes that with the support of her family, they will keep going and beat the competition.

Silveria wishes to have a safe and comfortable living, with a house of durable ceiling and walls. She has applied for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy construction materials, for the renovation of her house. Silveria wants nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life with her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, for the renovation of her house.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es:
Octavio vive en casa propia con su cónyuge. Aproximadamente más de 20 años. Buenas referencias personales y laborales. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia. La misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Octavio se dedica a la venta de animales (patos y chanchos) en el distrito de Cayaltí y también percibe otros ingresos de pensión por jubilación en la empresa Cayaltí hace 05 años aproximadamente. El destino del prestamo es para la compra de animales y arreglos de corral. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Octavio has lived at home with his wife for over 20 years. He has good personal and work references. He is very close with his family. He lives in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture and livestock, located in the district of Cayaltí, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, north coast of Peru.
Octavio sells animals (ducks and pigs) in the district of Cayaltí, and he has also received additional income from retirement funds during the past 5 years. He wants to use this loan to purchase of animals and repair their pens. This will allow him to improve his revenue, increase profits and thus improve his quality of life and his family's.

loans.use: to purchase of animals and repair their pens

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee tiene 53 años de edad, su estado civil es casada, tiene 4 hijos, mayores de edad vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge en el distrito de La Matanza. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente debido a que no existe peligro alguno, en lo que respecta al negocio u a otra actividad que se desarrolla, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería y crianza de animales. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Aydee es la venta de chicha de jora, cerveza y crianza de animales. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 15 años, en la parte delantera de su domicilio. El destino del crédito será para realizar mejoras en su vivienda. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el producto es comercial en la zona. Piensa trabajar otorgando buen producto a sus clientes e incrementando sus ventas, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Aydee is 53 years old. She is married and has four adult children. She lives in her own house with her husband in the La Matanza district. Life in the district is tranquil, because there is no danger at all with respect to business or other activities that take place. The residents work in farming, ranching, and livestock production. Her community is located in the La Matanza district, in the province of Morropón in the Piura region of Peru's northern coast. 

Aydee's business is the sale of "chicha de jora" [a traditional fermented corn-based beverage] and beer, and raising animals. She has done this for more than 15 years in the front part of her residence.

The objective of the loan will be to carry out improvements to her house. The market outlook is good because her product is marketable in the area. In her work, she plans to provide a good product to her customers and increase her sales, which will permit her to improve her income in the short term, increase her profits, and therefore improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es:
Agustina tiene 49 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive en el distrito de La Matanza. Tiene 3 hijos, mayores de edad, vive en casa de sus padres. La vida en el lugar es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, como sustento principal, siembra y cosecha de banano, maíz, frejol, caupí. Etc.Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Agustina es la venta de chicha de jora, cerveza y piqueos. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 4 años en el distrito, el destino del crédito será para invertirlo en su negocio y cancelar un terreno para su vivienda; además también comprará maíz como materia prima para su negocio, cerveza, etc. La inversión le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos para su familia. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el negocio es semanal Piensa trabajar invirtiendo en su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias que le permitan a un mediano o corto plazo aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Agustina is 49 years old; her marital status is single; she lives in the district of La Matanza.  She has three children, all adults, and she lives in her parents' home.  Life in this area is quiet; its inhabitants work in farming and ranching; the primary source of income is planting and harvesting bananas, corn, beans, black-eyed peas, etc.  Her community is located in the district of La Matanza, Morropón Province, Piura Region, on the northern coast of Peru.  

Agustina's business is selling the traditional corn liquor chicha, beer, and snacks.  She has had this business for over four years in the district; the loan will be used to invest in her business and to pay for a plot of land for her home.  She will also buy corn as raw material for her business, beer, etc.  This investment will help her make better income for her family.  The market offers good prospects because her business is weekly.  

She plans on working and investing in her business to make better profits, which will allow her in the mid- or short-term to increase her income.

loans.use: to invest in her business and to pay for a plot of land for her home, as well as to buy corn as raw material for her business, beer, etc.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 52 años de edad, es casado, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Antonio se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar su inventario de animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Antonio piensa mejorar productividad y diversidad de los animales para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Antonio is 52 years old, married, has one child, and lives with his family in a rural area of the district of Oyotún, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru.  His community works essentially in farming, livestock, and commerce.  

Antonio raises and sells animals for a living with over 10 years of experience in the business.  His business is located in his own home; he is requesting this loan to buy more animals; this investment will help him increase his inventory of animals, which will have a huge impact on his business.  Antonio is planning on improving the yield and diversity of his animals to be able to meet the various needs and tastes of the clientele in the area.  This will allow him in the short term to improve his income, increase his earnings, and thereby improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy more animals, which investment will increase his inventory of animals

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is a married woman and has three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 44 years old, and two of her children are currently in school.

Divina has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional materials for her business, like fishing net, gasoline, and fish container.

In the future, Divina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her fishing business, like fishing net, gasoline, and fish container

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz tiene un gran reto para el cual pide la colaboración, comentando un poco la vida de ella es una mujer que heredo unas tierras por parte de su padre, madre de 2 hijos de 20 y 22 años de edad que busca un apoyo crediticio para levantar los terrenos que le dejaron y así hacer de estos una actividad auto-sostenible en el tiempo y mas que no tiene un apoyo será la oportunidad perfecta para tener su propia empresa. 
La ayuda que pide Luz es que la apoyen prestándole un corto capital con el que podrá arreglar la tierra, comprar semillas para plantar y fumigar solo eso ella hará de este negocio una empresa que provea alimentos saludos para el consumo humano.
Su sueño es darles educación a sus hijos y sabe que con el apoyo tendrá una empresa que genere capital para lograr este sueño.
texts.en:
Luz has a big challenge and she needs some help. She inherited some land from her father. She is a mother of 2, ages 20 and 22 and she's looking for financial support to work on the land she owns now. She wants this activity of be self-sustaining over time, but she doesn't have any support, so this will be the perfect opportunity for her to have her own business.
Luz would like your help with this loan to work on the soil, buy seeds for planting and fertilizers, that she can turn into a company that provide food for human consumption.
Her dream is to provide her children with an education and she knows this business can help her to achieve this dream.

loans.use: to restore the land the inherited from her father by buying seeds for planting and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her qualifying course

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley earns income from her little sari-sari store. She’s been engaged in this business for three years, already. She earns approximately PHP 9,000 each month, doing this type of business activity. That amount is so helpful to increase their family income.

Now Shirley has requested a loan, to be used in purchasing an additional stock of groceries and other consumable products for retail sale. Shirley has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her sari-sari store business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of groceries and other consumable products

loans.name: Blanca Leticia

texts.es:
Blanca de 20 años de edad, es madre soltera vive con su madre, hermanos y su pequeño hijo, antes ella y su familia vivian en un lugar muy alejado de la ciudad y por problemas de transporte les tocaba caminar casi dos horas cuesta arriba para lograr llegar a la ciudad, pero decidieron mudarse y hoy viven cerca de la ciudad y solo caminan 10 minutos para tomar el autobús.

 Blanca y su mamá encontraron trabajo, la madre de Blanca trabaja en casa como empleada domestica y Blanca como vendedora de accesorios y teléfonos  mientras su padre, hermano trabajan en la agricultura y su hermana menor le cuida a su hijo. 

Blanca trabaja en una venta de accesorios y teléfonos, es una joven muy aplicada en su trabajo y le va muy bien en las ganancias, gracias a su trabajo ayudo a sus padres para que lograran construir un techo digno. Ella trabaja de 7:30 am a 4:00 pm y luego atiende a su pequeño y ayuda en la casa con los quehaceres.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar celulares, cargadores, baterías, audífonos, protectores, etc. para surtir su negocio. Porque ademas de vender en el negocio también lo hace por cuenta propia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 20 years old and a single mother who lives with her mother, her siblings, and her young child. She and her family previously lived in a place that was far from the city. Due to problems with transportation, it took her almost two hours to walk in order to reach the city. For this reason, she decided to move and now she lives near the city. It only takes her 10 minutes to travel by bus.

Blanca and her mother were able to find work. Her mother works at a private home as a domestic employee. Blanca sells telephones and accessories. Her father and brother work in agriculture, while her younger sister takes care of her son.

Blanca works by selling telephones and accessories. She is a young woman who applies herself to her work and earns a good living. Thanks to her work, Blanca was able to help her parents with building a decent house. She works from 7:30 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. Afterwards, she takes care of her young one and helps with the household chores.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy mobile phones, chargers, batteries, headphones, cases, and other products to restock her business. In addition to selling at her own business, she wants to earn her own income.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones, chargers, batteries, headphones, cases, and other products.

loans.name: Jose Ignacio

texts.es:
José es un ingenioso laborioso trabajador que se dedica al negocio de la cría de cerdos una actividad muy común y competida en el barrio de chinu.
Tiene una pequeña hija de 4 años de edad por la cual responder.
Pensando mucho en los fuertes cambios de clima, quiere construir una cochera más resistente para sus animales pro lo que quiere solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de madera, cemento, y comprar cerdos, este crédito no solo le permitirá tener cocheras más seguras y más animales para vender. 
Su sueño es aumentar sus ventas para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is a clever, industrious worker who is in the business of raising pigs, a very common and competitive activity in the Chinu neighborhood.
He has a 4-year-old daughter to support.
Having in mind a severe climate changes in his area, he wants to build a stronger enclosure for his animals so he wants to ask for this loan to purchase wood, concrete, and buy pigs. This loan will not only allow him to have a safer farm and also to hold more animals to sell.
His dream is to increase sales to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood and concrete to build a safer enclosure for his animals due to severe climate change in his region

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es:
El coraje, tenacidad y capacidad para superar situaciones adversas llevo a gloria a montar su propio negocio de confecciones a terceros, una alternativa que tomo una vez su esposo falleció y sabía que las riendas del hogar, los gatos y todo iba de cuenta de ella y con valor los enfrento y hoy tiene una empresa auto-sostenible que necesita un empujón para poder comprar una maquina recubridora que necesita para desarrollar sus procesos. 
Esta luchadora madre solo pide una ayuda para seguir creciendo y superar todas las adversidades que el futuro depara para ella, además que vela por el cuido de tres hijos que los ama con todo el corazón.
texts.en:
The courage, tenacity and ability to overcome adversity lead Gloria to set up her own clothing business to sell to third parties, an alternative she thought about after her husband passed away. At that moment, she knew she had to cover all her household expenses by herself. She needs a boost in her business, so she's asking for a serger machine to improve her business.
She is a fighting, single mother that seeks help to continue to grow and overcome all odds that the future holds for her. She wants to take care of her three children who she loves with all her heart.

loans.use: to buy a serger machine to improve her business after her husband passed away

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian, 50 years old, is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Lilian has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF, which she will use to buy ingredients for her food preparation business. Lilian has been in this business for 28 years.

In the future, Lilian would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food preparation business.

loans.name: Veronica Eliseth

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 56 años, viuda, conocida en el medio, por su labor de venta de abarrotes. Vive en casa familiar con 02 hijas de 09 y 06 años respectivamente, las cuales estudian en colegio nacional de la zona. Persona con buenas referencias. Familia unida. Vive en una comunidad habitada por gente respetuosa y amigable, que se dedican al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Su comunidada está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Verónica se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, desde hace más de 02 años. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 06 meses. Necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de mercadería para su bodega, y de esa manera surtirla y obtener mayor ingreso por ventas al mes. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Verónica is 56 years old and a widow. She is known in her area for selling groceries. She lives in a family house with her two daughters, 9 and 6 years old respectively, who study at the national college in the area. She is a person with good references and a close-knit family. She lives in a community of respectful and friendly people, who make their livings in retail, farming and livestock. Her community is located in Cayaltí district, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque, on the north coast of Perú.

For more than 2 years, Verónica has made a living selling groceries, and 6 months ago, she also began to make a living raising and selling pigs. She needs this loan in order to purchase merchandise for her shop, enabling her to restock it and earn a better monthly income. This will allow her, in a short amount of time, to improve her income and her profits and thus improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for restocking her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his qualifying course, which will allow him to get a job that pays better

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to provess her daughter's university degree

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
